set_saldo_placeholder: Enter new balance (will replace old balance). Example: <1>100000</1> (will become {{exampleRupiah}})
add_saldo_placeholder:
Enter the amount of balance to <1>add</1> to the selected user.
Example: <3>100000</3> (balance will increase).
add_saldo_hint: Enter the amount of balance to add (in numbers)
add_saldo_select_user: Please select a user to add balance.
enter_new_password_hint: Enter a new password for the selected user.
password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters.
settings_must_login: You must be logged in to access settings.
settings_password_placeholder: Leave blank to keep current password
name: Name
Are you sure you want to delete this pac: Are you sure you want to delete this package?
discount_user_desc: {{price}} - {{discount}} = {{result}} will be reduced from user points.
add_point_placeholder: Enter the amount of points to <1>add</1> to the selected user. Example: <3>100</3> (points will increase).
add_point_hint: Enter the amount of points to add (in numbers)
add_point_select_user: Please select a user to add points.
set_point_placeholder: Enter new points (will replace old points). Example: <1>100</1> (will become {{exampleRupiah}})
type_helper: Type of discount: 'percent' applies a percentage discount, 'fixed' applies a fixed amount.
value_helper: For 'percent', enter the discount percentage (e.g., 10 for 10%). For 'fixed', enter the discount amount.
max_discount_helper: Maximum discount amount that can be applied (only relevant for 'percent' type). Leave blank for no limit.
usage_limit_helper: Maximum number of times this voucher can be used. Leave blank or 0 for unlimited.
